description: Trapperkeeper is an open source services framework for large scale Clojure applications. Trapperkeeper is used for decomposing application code into reusable, swappable, and composable components. At Puppet Labs, we now use it as the basis for all of our backend development. Come hear an introduction to Trapperkeeper and a tour of all of its core services including our new transparent RPC capability.
title: Intro to Trapperkeeper
